definition: to discuss matters of vital importance
common/general/to share/together/total/altogether/abbr. for 共產黨|共产党[Gong4 chan3 dang3], Communist party
commerce/merchant/dealer/to consult/2nd note in pentatonic scale/quotient (as in 智商[zhi4 shang1], intelligence quotient)

sentences.english: He was now in the measures of Lewis XIV.
sentences.chinese: 他此刻正与路易十四共商大计。

definition: to cooperate on a great undertaking or joint project
to congregate in one hall (idiom); to gather under one roof
pay an official call/call on/visit in an official capacity
to be present at a meeting
meetings conducted by rulers in feudal China for the purpose of formalizing alliances, finalizing treaties
cross a river in the same boat (idiom); fig. having common interests/obliged to collaborate towards common goals
